about_the_game:
"You Can't See Ghosts!" is a puzzle game where you help two friendly ghosts climb a mysterius tower by solving rooms and guiding them to the exit. But there's a twist, you can't see ghosts! Use various context clues within each room, such as the sounds they make when bumping into walls or when stepping on glass, to determine their exact position as you guide them to the exit. What other mind-bending tricks does this tower hold, and who is this Curator? There's only one way to find out!

At launch, the game will feature over 100 unique rooms with a variety of intriguing and mind-bending mechanics as well as secrets, catering to both casual players and those seeking a challenge.

HISTORY TRACKER
Each room provides a history tracker that records all the moves the ghosts made, along with all the sounds cues that occurred. This tool is useful for those that want to recall the information as well as those that have a difficulty hearing.



REPLAY
After completing a room, sit back and watch a full replay of the game where you can see everything that was invisible and laugh at all the misconceptions and mistakes you made along the way. The replay offers settings to adjust the speed and helps you pinpoint specific moments.



MARKERS
Too much to remember? The marker tool allows you to place various markers on the screen and move them around as you see fit. It's a perfect tool for more challenging rooms as well as visualizing your thought patterns.



HINTS
Most rooms offer a variety of tailored hints, increasing in usefulness with each one. From general information to detailed help on solving the room or finding the ghosts' locations.

STORY
The game features a simple yet lighthearted story as you learn more about the ghosts, the mysterious Curator and the tower itself.
